body:
Hi Chris,

Wonder how the design flow rate in the ZoneMixing block is calculated?

Found in the HB_HB a Flow Rate of 0.0963, but can't find where the calculation is done.

Trying to check multiplying by the area or dividing by the volume don't give me the input number in the idf.

Can you shed some light here?



Thanks,

-A.

replies.body:
Hi,

It's been a while since i asked this ...

In the meantime i've found this [discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/interzone-airflow-rate-for-a-large-volume). From that and from seeing the HB_setEPNatVent interZoneAirFlowRate_ input it is correct to say that the calculation is 0.0963 multiplied for the area of the air wall? With this the numbers fit, but just want to be sure.

Thanks,

-A.
